title: $1500 Off Move IN!! Renovated Units!! Move In Today!!
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '3', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '1197', 'Address:', '501 E Lake Mead Pkwy', 'Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.', 'Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', 'Polished kitchen countertops', 'In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher', 'Separate dining area', 'Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity', 'Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', 'Mountain views', 'Professional onsite management', 'Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating and firepit', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
